Title: Four energy majors buy into ADNOC’s Ruwais LNG
Description: Shell, alongside TotalEnergies, BP and Mitsui, have agreed to invest invest in the Abu Dhabi National Oil Company’s 9.6 mtpa Ruwais LNG project in Abu Dhabi by purchasing a 10% participating interest each.
Author: JS

Title: UPDATE: Freeport LNG yet to resume exports even as ships wait to berth at the terminal
Description: The 15 mtpa Freeport LNG plant on Quintana Island, Texas, has yet to restart exports following a halt to operations on July 7 to prepare for any potential impact from Hurricane Beryl’s anticipated landfall in Texas on Jul. 8.
Author: CK
